para.text: How to compile the project without using IDE

text.style: font-family:Verdana; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Make sure that Ant is installed correctly. For this, in the command line or terminal you have to type

para.style: margin-top:16px; line-height:1.00; background-color:#000000; padding:8px; border-color:#cccccc; border-style:single; border-width:2px; tabstops:none;

li.text: Copy the string into the file startJetty.vmoptions in the root of your backup instance of TrackStudio.

para.style: line-height:1.00; background-color:#ffffcc; padding:8px; border-color:#606060; border-style:single; border-width:1px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Courier New'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: -Xdebug -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5005

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:16px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:verdana; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:16px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.style: line-height:1.00; background-color:#000000; padding:8px; border-color:#cccccc; border-style:single; border-width:2px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Courier New'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ffffff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: sh startJetty

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:verdana; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Following line must appear in the terminal

para.style: line-height:1.00; background-color:#000000; padding:8px; border-color:#cccccc; border-style:single; border-width:2px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Courier New'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ffffff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Listening for transport dt_socket at address: 5005

li.text: Select the earlier created configuration of TrackStudio and press the button for debugging.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:16px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:verdana; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Put the breakpoints at the required places.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Through the browser, enter TrackStudio and execute the functions, which must stop debugger at the required points.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:16px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:verdana; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Stop the backup instance of TrackStudio.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Recompile your source code as per the above mentioned instruction.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

li.text: Repeat until all errors are fixed
